title: Major performance improvements to old-style create rights editing.
Document sync now supports automatic document inactivation for document types which don't have an out-of-the-box ACTIVE column.
Added the ability to use a subtab view (a tab with multiple subtabs) as a child/sub-view on another view. An almost incomprehensible sentence but, for those of you waiting for this... it's here!
Resolved issue where custom tabs wouldn't correctly hide the time component of unzoned date fields.
Resolved issue where tab visibility rules were ignored on subviews.
